wordpressPage.title: The Big Quiz 2
wordpressPage.content:
This resource is the second of our ‘Big Quizzes’. This quiz has been tried and tested with young people and has 5 rounds.

Items Needed: YouTube Clips of the music needed. You’ll also need the ‘Close Up’ images which can be downloaded here: Keynote (Mac) | PDF | PowerPoint

Click here to download the quiz questions and answersClick here to download the quiz questions and answers

Included: Music round, general knowledge, A to Z Animals round, Close up round and General Knowledge round
